messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: New Zatoichi
messages.msgSnippet: I m really looking forward to this. Of course, I somehow find the thought of a Takashi Miike version of Zatoichi even more compelling. =) -Thom
messages.messageBody:
I'm really looking forward to this. Of course, I somehow find the thought of a
Takashi Miike version of Zatoichi even more compelling. =)

-Thom

messages.msgSnippet: I enjoyed the ride, now I want these films! Aku...Soku...Zan ... ride.

Aku...Soku...Zan

Hi

I have several of the original Zatoichi movies, they
are excellent, I hope this one will be as good

--- Thomas Davidson <thomas@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
For Chambara fans -

Takeshi Kitano has made a new movie of an old subject
- Zatoichi.

The film was previewed at the Venice Film festival,
and won a
standing ovation and four awards. You can view a
trailer here:

http://195.246.158.78/celluloiddreams.htm

Thomas

messages.subject: New Zatoichi
messages.msgSnippet: For Chambara fans - Takeshi Kitano has made a new movie of an old subject - Zatoichi. The film was previewed at the Venice Film festival, and won a standing
messages.messageBody:
For Chambara fans -

Takeshi Kitano has made a new movie of an old subject - Zatoichi.

The film was previewed at the Venice Film festival, and won a
standing ovation and four awards. You can view a trailer here:

http://195.246.158.78/celluloiddreams.htm

Thomas
